divs: sighting detailsi was outside with my dogs at about 10:30 pm. i had my my night vision binoculars looking at the night sky. i saw an airplane (with the flashing lights) in the southern sky and in front of it at a close distance (maybe 1\2in looking through the binoculars, was a bright white orb flying at the same speed. my grandson and i watched it for maybe 2 minutes and then is just dimmed slightly and dissapeared. the plane seemed to slow just a little and kept on flying. they were traveling south to east. i was very excited as i had seen ufo's like this at james gillilands ranch in troutlake wa.
